name: CW_ABST_UF_SESSIONS
description: Ultrafiltration sessions adequacy information from abstractions with clinical hemodialysis information reported to CROWNWeb, the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UF_SESSION_ID
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's ultrafiltration session ID.

columns.name: UF_SESSION_DATE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's ultrafiltration session date.

columns.name: UF_SESSION_PRE_WEIGHT_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's ultrafiltration session pre-treatment weight.

columns.name: UF_SESSION_PRE_WEIGHT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's ultrafiltration session pre-treatment weight unit.

columns.name: UF_SESSION_POST_WEIGHT_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's ultrafiltration session post-treatment weight.

columns.name: UF_SESSION_POST_WEIGHT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's ultrafiltration session post-treatment weight unit.

columns.name: UF_SESSION_DELIVERED_MINUTES
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's ultrafiltration session delivered minutes.
